@graph.headline: The Problem With Print On Demand SEO & How To Solve It!
@graph.description: Print on demand (POD) businesses can be highly successful, but they are prone to website SEO issues. A typical POD business will use Shopify or an alternative ecommerce platform, list custom products such as t-shirts, hoodies, other apparel, mugs and gifts for example. Generally custom graphics or imagery is created for the products using a […]

@graph.description: Business model where custom products are created and shipped only after customer orders are placed

@graph.name: Boilerplate content
@graph.description: Generic, template-based content that is reused across multiple websites without customization

@graph.name: SEO meta fields
@graph.description: HTML elements including titles, descriptions, and tags that help search engines understand page content

@graph.name: Duplicate content
@graph.description: Identical or very similar content that appears on multiple websites, which can harm search engine rankings
